steps.description: Remove all logging from the planner â€“ instead, the CLI or other client code handles logging
acceptance: The planner package does not log anything

steps.description: The output of plan inspect <plan-name> doesnt render right: there are backslash-n sequences instead of newlines; also the the step identifier is not included in the headline for a task.
acceptance: Step identifiers are part of the headline

steps.description: In Inspect() change the headline to only contain the task index, status and ID.  The task description should be a paragraph under the headline.
